content: shortie socks are to sock knitters what espresso is to caffeine seekers instant gratification okay so maybe they re not instant but they sure are fast fun and gratifying this simple vanilla shortie sock is designed to knit up quickly while letting that special hand-dyed colorway you know that one you ve been hoarding shine if you re knitting these socks check out the **summer sock knit-along** i m hosting in the knit free or dye podcast group 1 for a chance to win some prizes heck you re knitting the socks anyway right this a plain vanilla ankle sock with my version of an afterthought heel this is my personal shortie sock recipe that fits my size 7 foot it should also fit a women s sizes 6 5 8 i tried to make the pattern as clear as possible for first time sock knitters but having a basic understanding of sock construction will be helpful pattern is written for 9 inch circulars and magic loop method for heel and toe drecreases and does not give instructions for dpn s what you ll need yarn approximately 30 grams fingering weight yarn in main color and approximately 15 grams of contrasting color for heels and toes yarn used in pattern photos is hypnotic yarn s awesome sox base 80/20 superwash bfl/nylon cuff leg and foot in colorway good morning and contrasting heels and toe in colorway faded blue jeans needles us size 1 2 25mm or size to obtain gauge 9 inch circulars or long circular for magic loop i suggest 32 40 inch cord if using magic loop method happy knitting 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/knit-free-or-dye-podcast
